data.value: ITBeard - life and work in IT ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ #stopwarinukraine

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_1
data.value:
Hi! My name is Lex and I am a bearded programmer :)
For a long time I have accumulated a lot of experience, stories and acquaintances, which I share in my show.

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_2
data.value:
The show "ITBeard" is about the life of IT people from the inside and with its episodes tells about programming languages, popular technologies, professions, famous representatives of the sphere and their way of development.
Without any censorship, labels or extra pathos.

data.name: AboutShow_Paragraph_3
data.value: All of ITBeard's content, together with you, forms a community of like-minded people who can turn this world upside down and change themselves for the better. So, GET THERE!
